models.categories: Four skill categories representing different dimensions of product work.

skills.title: Problem Framing & Decision Loops
skills.description:
I begin with behaviour, constraints, and outcomes — not features.
Map the decision path → remove friction → ship in tight learning cycles.
**Rivo** (Mortgage Ops): review + triage workflow redesign → **~30% lower effort** per case and higher case-throughput per specialist.

skills.title: Roadmapping & Prioritisation
skills.description:
Decisions are guided by activation, retention, and time-to-decision, not feature volume.
**Attentive OS**: proposal-engine iterations focused on workflow gains → **~25% reduction** in manual effort across operations.

skills.title: 0→1 & Continuous Improvement
skills.description:
Move ideas from insight → first usable version → measured adoption, without over-engineering.
Lightweight V1s shipped early; strengthened through usage-driven learning.
**Principles**: clarity in thinking • speed in execution • discipline in measurement.

skills.title: Workflow-First AI Integration
skills.description:
AI is used where it reduces cognitive load, removes repetition, or improves decision quality.
**TalentKnct** (RAG Matching Engine): embeddings + feedback loops → **10+ internship placements**, improvements driven by real-world signals.

skills.title: Human-in-the-Loop Decision Systems
skills.description:
AI accelerates judgment — humans own outcomes.
Design centres on trust, interpretability, and correction loops.

skills.title: Impact-Driven Evaluation
skills.description:
Success measured through relevance, engagement, and task-completion lift, not vanity metrics.
The goal isn't to "add AI" — it's to make workflows lighter, faster, and more accurate.

skills.title: Backend Foundations — Python · Django · APIs
skills.description:
Work close to systems and data flows to make grounded product decisions.
**HealthifyMe** (Core Journeys): caching + query optimisation → **4× faster responses** and **~10% lower cloud costs**, with higher reliability at scale.

skills.title: Performance as a Product Lever
skills.description: Treat latency, throughput, reliability as experience and business value — not just engineering concerns.

skills.title: System Design Awareness
skills.description:
Prefer simple, predictable architectures that scale without unnecessary complexity.
Connect product intent ↔ engineering reality so what we design is buildable, efficient, and durable.

skills.title: User Insight & Behaviour Understanding
skills.description:
Conversations, journey mapping, and workflow observation to surface true friction, not assumptions.
**Rivo** discovery revealed duplicate-entry + handoff bottlenecks that shaped the workflow redesign.

skills.title: Structured Communication & Alignment
skills.description: Share reasoning clearly → teams stay aligned → execution moves faster.

skills.title: Ownership & Calm Delivery
skills.description: Take problems end-to-end; operate with intention; stay outcome-oriented over output-oriented.
